section.name: DataNucleus Access Platform 1.1.6 Released
section.p: October 11th 2009- DataNucleus Access Platform 1.1.6 ("Rutherford") is released. DataNucleus Access Platform provides persistence and retrieval of Java objects to/from a wide range of datastores including RDBMS, db4o, LDAP, XML, Excel, ODF and BigTable. Version 1.1.6 includes the following changes over 1.1.5

ul.li: Bug fix to PersistenceManager proxy in multithreaded environments
Bug fix to interface mapping strategy "xcalia"
RDBMS : Bug fix to instanceof when handling possible subclasses
RDBMS : Bug fix to detection of discriminator when handling superclasses

section.p: This release is downloadable under an Apache 2 license from the DataNucleus community site.
